name: Brainboy
body:
### Brainboy
BrainBoy is a free iPhone game developed for the SACE Stage 2 Research Project, that lets the player complete familiar proverbs and commonly known phrases in order to strengthen the long-term memory of early to middle stage Alzheimer's and Dementia patients. 

### Usage
Only use for copy paste code. No full usage case. 
- missing: graphics, vectors, sprites and music

### Author
Willr - [31ll.com](http://31ll.com/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
